name: Easy Pasta Shells
description: This is a good choice for when you need a quick-fix pasta and a great chance to use up any leftovers that need a home! Stir in cooked chicken or fish and any vegetables too.

ingredients.name: small pasta shells or other bite-sized pasta

preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta until al dente, 6â€“8 minutes.
While pasta is cooking, in a large bowl, combine olive oil with seasoning and Parmesan.
Drain pasta and stir into oil mixture. Add freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Season with Salt and Pepper.
